H0.text: The nephew of a former captain, who was the only Scottish player in the Europe team. Colin Montgomerie

H1.text: The nephew of a former captain, who was the only Scottish player in the Europe team. Marc Warren

H2.text: The nephew of a former captain, who was the only Scottish player in the Europe team. Richie Ramsay

H3.text: The nephew of a former captain, who was the only Scottish player in the Europe team. Stephen Gallacher

A4.text: Stephen Gallacher is the nephew of former European Ryder Cup captain Bernard Gallacher.
